author: Video Advice
description:
🎓 Start learning cyber security with TryHackMe: https://tryhackme.com/videoadvice. Use my code "ADVICE25" to get 25% off on annual subscription.

Gary McKinnon is the hacker known as “the most dangerous hacker in the world.”
He broke into CIA, NASA, the U.S. military, and the Department of Defense — not to steal, but to search for the truth about hidden technology and extraterrestrial life.
The U.S. government accused him of committing the biggest military computer hack in history and threatened him with up to 60 years in prison.
But what he discovered inside those classified systems… was something no one was supposed to see.

This interview footage is courtesy of Gary McKinnon — you can watch the original full conversation on his channel here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZKfKIUXhqSM

Sources: 
UFO Hacker Gary McKinnon talks about NASA Hack - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZKfKIUXhqSM
Gary McKinnon interviewed by Richard Dolan - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IhUC80M8X1s
Richpla
title: He Hacked the US Government — What He Found Was Terrifying
